channel.title: Robotics-Blog on Miles Hilliard
channel.description: Recent content in Robotics-Blog on Miles Hilliard

item.title: Robotics & Engineering - Week of 12/16/24
item.description: During my time in the Robotics Shop 5th and 6th period this week, I made significant headway on the lightbox project. For my lightbox, I will be making a transparent “EXIT” sign that you frequently see in modern office buildings. These signs are very expensive and can be found online for hundreds of dollars. My plan is to make it for much less. The most expensive component to the project would be the acrylic, which can be found for about 10 dollars for an appropriate size.
